plot: Home from Iraq, SGT Adam Barlow is caught in a downward spiral of sadness and remorse. In a final attempt at redemption, he calls on his best friend and the shocking conclusion reveals Adam's last day in combat.
title: In Mexico
plot_es: Home from Iraq, SGT Adam Barlow is caught in a downward spiral of sadness and remorse. In a final attempt at redemption, he calls on his best friend and the shocking conclusion reveals Adam's last day in combat.
plot_en: Home from Iraq, SGT Adam Barlow is caught in a downward spiral of sadness and remorse. In a final attempt at redemption, he calls on his best friend and the shocking conclusion reveals Adam's last day in combat.
